Content.Text:
Good morning. My apologies for calling on you
at this early hour, but I have some news that
might interest you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today, we will be having our annual <RED><MOJI0>
Fashion Fiesta</RED>, and I wanted to see if you were
interested in participating.
<PAGE>
Twice a year, once in the spring and once in the
autumn, everyone gets together to show off their
favorite fashions of the season.
<PAGE>
This past spring, you seemed busy enough
getting settled in, so I thought it best to wait
until autumn to invite you to participate.
<PAGE>
There are some wonderful prizes in store for
those who display the finest fashion sense. It
really is quite a fun time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We will be accepting registrations at the <GREEN>Trade
Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>10:00 and 13:00</BLUE>. Please come
by if you'd like to participate.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today we will be having our annual <MOJI0>
Fashion Fiesta. Would you care to participate,
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We will be accepting registrations at the Trade
Depot between <BLUE>10:00 and 13:00</BLUE>. Please come
by if you'd like to participate.
